DOC.brief_summary: This observational study is aimed at exploring bladder function following temporary unilateral low loop cutaneous ureterostomy carried out in newborns suffering from severe congenital hydro-ureteronephrosis
DOC.brief_title: Unilateral Cutaneous Ureterostomy - Long Term Follow up
DOC.criteria: Living patients Bilateral functioning kidneys Unilateral ureteral cutaneous diversion Dead patients Single kidney High percutaneous ureteral diversion (e.g: cutaneous pyelostomies, bilateral cutaneous urinary diversion)
